title: [K-12] Indonesia-Malaysia Mathematics Teaching Strategies in the COVID-19 Era: PBL-based Online Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of Vocational Training Mathematics Curriculum and Practical Application Experience
context.additional_context: Implementation of mathematics pedagogy combining PBL and online learning activities in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more flexible class management strategies when designing math PBL projects using smartphone-based tools.
Learners can develop two or more learner-customized online assessment tools based on case analyses of Indonesia and Malaysia.
Learners can specify a learning objectives-activities-assessment linkage system for PBL-based math classes in limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
